title: The new About page
content:
Introducing My "About Me" Page

I'm excited to announce the launch of a brand-new About Me page on my personal portfolio website! 🎉 This page is a dedicated space where you can get to know more about who I am, both as a developer and as a person.

What’s New?

Here’s a quick rundown of what you’ll find on the new About Me page:

  • Meet the Designer and Developer: A personal introduction to who I am—Cristian Brinza, a 22-year-old developer from Chisinau, Moldova, passionate about creating visually appealing and user-friendly digital experiences.
  • Education Section: Learn about my academic journey at the Technical University of Moldova, and my earlier studies at the I.P. Center of Excellence in Informatics and Information Technologies.
  • Languages & Skills: Discover the languages I speak—Romanian, English, Russian, and French—and the technologies I’ve been mastering along the way.
  • Useful Links: Find easy access to my GitHub and LinkedIn profiles.

This new About Me page reflects my passion for technology, design, and continuous learning. It’s a space that captures the essence of what drives me as a developer and showcases my journey.

Check it out, get to know more about my story, and maybe even find some inspiration for your own projects. Stay tuned for more exciting updates to come!

Visit the new page here: About Me
